# threads

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of threads is to interact with the Slack API to retrieve and interrogate team conversations.

## Installation

``` r
remotes::install_github("yonicd/threads")
```

## In the Tin

  - Slack API GET for [conversation.history](https://api.slack.com/methods/conversations.history)
  - Slack API GET for [conversation.replies](https://api.slack.com/methods/conversations.replies)
  - Pagination Methods for both
  
More to come ....
